alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:17PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Todd and east central Bennett Counties through 800 PM MDT/900 PM CDT/... At 717 PM MDT/817 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vetal, or 18 miles east of Martin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vetal and Harrington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
